title: 'Much better than today’s hyped products'
body: 'It again proved a saying that Old is a Real Gold'

title: 'Bad packaging'
body: 'I like the consistency of the shampoo but the packaging was very poor. I was not able to use it in that bottle. I had to transfer it in a pump bottle'

title: 'Good shampoo in this price 👍👍'
body: 'Price for the quantity you are getting is very good. It is really a nice shampoo and you may give it a try. However bit dryness observed which you may overcome with few drops of oil.😀'

title: 'Bad packing'
body: 'Broken bottle cap Packing was very bad like a defective item'

title: 'very good item.'
body: 'I am using this shampoo since last tow decades its product of TATA so there is compromise on quality .its not that stylish of new shampoos which are available in market. its good quality and economic product for big family.'

title: 'Best'
body: 'This shampoo is best. It repaired my damaged hair. I am very happy 😁😁'

title: 'Made hair soft and controls hairfall'
body: 'I ordered the product being unsure  but it is the best shampoo I have ever used. It made my hair smoothsoft and controlled hairfall as well.'

title: 'Used date'
body: I want to buy halo shampoo but it's used date too early ..

title: 'Egg shampoo'
body: I really liked this product thank you amazon,from the beginning I use to wash my hairs with egg 🥚 shampoo since then I didn't get that shampoo in india I searched on amazon and this halo shampoo came in front of me I thought to buy but I was scared how fine it would be effective or not, so finally I bought this product it's really amazing shampoo I gave results to my hairs in just first wash 😀 😊 iam so happy I got this shampoo and ivl surely continue with this genuine product thank you Amazon for delivering on time and politeness thank you so much.

title: 'Quality'
body: It's good shampoo for ladies use

title: 'Best product'
body: 'Best product but packing is not good'

title: 'Really bad'
body: This shampoo roughens your hair and makes them more cheap/rough than ever before. You don't have to buy sandpaper for any DIY work, just cut your hair and use 😀

title: 'Not Foamy'
body: I purchased it at Rs 296/- where it was Rs 216/- in May 23. Shampoo not Foamy even if you keep on applying larger quantities. Gives sticky and rough hair after wash, doesn't seem idle for daily use

title: 'feeling egg'
body: 'product is good but feeling like a using egg.'

title: 'Love it'
body: I have been using it since I found it. It's a good shampoo for general use.

title: 'Amazing'
body: 'This is my second time buying the shampoo and I love everything about halo shampoo Very nice'

title: 'Shampoo'
body: 'Smell is mild . But hair soft is low just good to use. Nice . Hair hardness is heavy . Rough hair. Fragrance is okay'

title: 'Good'
body: 'The quality of the product is very good 👍'

title: 'Quantity and price👌'
body: 'Bottle quality is thin. All the rest are worth the money.'

title: 'Too harsh for you hair. But you can use it to wash clothes.'
body: 'I bought it for my kids but it made their hair dry and frizzy. Although you can use it to wash you new clothes as detergent makes them look old. Halo keeps your new clothes in good condition. Although you can use this shampoo for oiled hair as it drains out all the extra oil very easily!'

title: 'Totally waste of money and time'
body: It makes your hair total dry . People please don't buy this shampoo, instead buy any good shampoo, it's cost is low , quantity good.. but hair makes dry and rough..

title: 'Dry and not so smooth - duplicate??'
body: I have used this in Chennai. So after returning to my hometown i wasn't able to find the same. I ordered in Amazon. But to my disappointment this is not as smooth as I used in Chennai. My hair felt so dry and not so smooth. Might be duplicate 🥺

title: 'Excellent Product'
body: 'Excellent Shampoo I am using from many years everyday. Value for money'

title: 'Good to buy'
body: It's good product at this price range
